frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering at Kubecon Europe 2023
frontmatter.location: Kubecon EU in Amsterdam, The Netherlands
frontmatter.venue_address: Avenida de las ferias s/n, 46035 Valencia, Spain
frontmatter.price: In-Person and Virtual Attendance are Free
frontmatter.registration_text: Register to Attend In-person or Virtually
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering is on April 18 in Central European Summer Time (CEST)
frontmatter.info_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held live in Amsterdam, The Netherlands and broadcast live to regional watch parties around the globe. As always, our focus is on creating a space for peer-to-peer interactions and we'll be going hybrid, so if you are unable to attend in person, join us online. This Gathering will focus on Emerging Technology and Case Studies from and by End Users with production deployments of OpenShift sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and  lessons learned along the way. Topics covered during this Gathering include hybrid cloud infrastructure, cloud-native development, and new Emerging technology initiatives on the Edge.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held on Central European Summer Time (CEST). Please note: In-person attendees are encouraged to also register for Kubecon/EU, however, it is not mandatory. Reception is Open to all registered attendees and starts at 5:00 p.m.

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Unlock the Potential of Collaboration

Partner Case Study: AWS on OpenShift (ROSA)
Partner Case Study: Cloud Pak 3.0 Architecture
